unnormalised: Arrey yaar, this meeting is at 3:00 AM IST? Matlab, while you guys are discussing serious matters, I'll be battling mosquitoes and contemplating life at 2:30 AM PKT. Seriously, can we prepone this to maybe, say, 10:00 AM IST? Otherwise, I'll be joining the call looking like I haven't slept since 20/02/2020... which, honestly, isn't far from the truth! Maybe send some chai and biscuits across the time zones, eh?
normalised: Arrey yaar, this meeting is at three A-M I-S-T? Matlab, while you guys are discussing serious matters, I'll be battling mosquitoes and contemplating life at two thirty A-M P-K-T. Seriously, can we prepone this to maybe, say, ten A-M I-S-T? Otherwise, I'll be joining the call looking like I haven't slept since twentieth february two thousand and twenty... which, honestly, isn't far from the truth! Maybe send some chai and biscuits across the time zones, eh?
